concept: Use margins, padding, borders and box sizing.

challenges.title: Q1: Card Box
challenges.description: Create a 'card' div with some text inside. Apply CSS to give it a border, padding, margin from the page edge, and a fixed width (e.g., 300px).
challenges.outputDescription: A card-like box with clear spacing.
examples: Use box-sizing: border-box to make width easier to control.

challenges.title: Q2: Two Columns (Basic)
challenges.description: Create two divs side by side that each contain some text. Use CSS (float or inline-block or flex if you know it) to make them appear in two columns with some gap.
challenges.outputDescription: Two columns visible on the page.
examples: Columns could be 45% width each with margin between.
